content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.couverturesociale5 (
	[PAYS] nvarchar(50),
	[ANNEE] nvarchar(50),
	[POPULATION_COUVERTE(Milliers_personnes)] float,
	[POPULATION_COUVERTE(%)] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'argent/couverturesociale/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = ExternalDatasourceDatalake,
	FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
	)
